item.title: Why Nvidia's $5 billion Intel investment makes so much sense
item.description: Steven Orr, CEO & founder of Quasar Markets, explains why Nvidia's new partnership with Intel is such a strategic play.

item.title: Popular fast-food chicken chain closes about 20% of its locations
item.description: The chicken tenders chain is being replaced by another legendary fried chicken brand.

item.title: Wall Street blinked, then Nvidia built its boldest partnership yet
item.description: After converting one of its biggest doubters, Nvidia inked an agreement that might change how AI power is used and safeguarded.

item.title: Wayfair is selling a cozy $910 loveseat for only $190
item.description: It blends style and comfort seamlessly.

item.title: US government warns about refunds after protests at popular tourist site
item.description: The embassy warning tells travelers about "rescheduling or reimbursement options."
